name: Emerging Therapeutics Summit 2016 (ETS'16)
content: The first Emerging Therapeutics Summit (ETS), (http://www.ets16.org/), will be held in Melbourne, Australia from 23 to 25 November 2016\. The summit aims to foster international collaboration and commercialisation. ETSâ€™16 covers a wide range of topics with large number of oral presentations, including but not limited to the followings: 1\. Molecular & cellular mechanisms of cancer and other major diseases; 2\. Gene therapies (including RNA and vaccines); 3\. Antibody technologies and therapies; 4\. Normal & cancer stem cells and therapeutics; 5\. Nanomedicine; 6\. Natural medicine and FDA approval 7\. Multidrug resistance 8\. Drug delivery
